T10cansisyu:6: yaḥ sarvadā parasukhaikaraso babhūva duḥkhena duḥkhamagamatparamaṃ pareṣām
T10cansisyu:9: vicchi x māvayasi yasya śiraḥ parārthax xx sannayanapaṅkajatāmavāpa |
T10cansisyu:10: svārthaṃ punax xxx xsitātapatrā pṛthvī babhūva niśiteva kṛpāṇadhārā ||
T10cansisyu:13: doṣāndhakārabhidureṇa manorameṇa yenoditena śaśineva jagatprakāśam || Śl_5
T10cansisyu:15: yacchāsanaṃ śubhamakhaṇḍaviśuddhavṛttaṃ pātālamūrdhani layatimiraṃ pramārṣṭi || Śl_6 ||
T10cansisyu:16: dharmāmbuvāha iva yo 'bhyudito hitāya dharmāmṛtaṃ jalamivaikarasaṃ vavarṣa
T10cansisyu:17: tāpāpax xxx xxx xxx xx yadanekarasax xxx xxx xxx xxx x||
T10cansisyu:20: tatsaṃsthitaṃ bhavati sarvajanopakāraṃx xxx xxx xxx xxx x|| Śl_8
T10cansisyu:21: tajjāgaraṃ maraṇajanmajarāpahāri ye nāpnuvanti na pibanti na dhārayanti |
T10cansisyu:22: te māhitā bahulamohamahāmadenax xxx xxx xx dhamādriyante || Śl_9 ||
T10cansisyu:24: tacchāsanaṃ samadhigamya yadutsṛjanti mohasya tadvilasitaṃ paramādbhutasya
T10cansisyu:25: śikṣāx xx viditeṣviva bodhisaudhasopānapaddhatipadeṣu padaṃ dadhānāḥ |
T10cansisyu:26: tuṅgāṃ prayānti padavīmanivartamānā bhūmiṃ nijāmavataranti vivartamānāḥ ||
T10cansisyu:27: janmārṇavaṃ paramadustaramuttitīrṣuḥ śīlaplavaṃ ka iha hastagataṃ jahāti |
T10cansisyu:28: kāntāramadhyapatitaḥ kathamāryasārthādbhraṣṭo na śocati ciraṃ supathānabhijñaḥ || Śl_12 ||
T10cansisyu:30: muñcanti ye jinaguṇāvalimantarāle vegena te viṣamapātamadhaḥ patanti ||
T10cansisyu:31: ekākino 'pi manasā niyamaṃ prakalpya ye karmaṇā samuditena samunnayanti |
T10cansisyu:32: te sādhavo bhuvanamaṇḍalamaulibhūtāstaireva yānti gurutāṃ guravaḥ suśiṣyaiḥ || Śl_14 ||
T10cansisyu:34: tejasvinaḥ sukhamasūnapi saṃtyajanti satyasthitivyasanino na punaḥ pratijñām || Śl_15 ||
T10cansisyu:35: tiṣṭhantu tāvadiha sarvajanāpavādāḥ sarvāśca pāpagatayo nirayāśca ghorāḥ |
T10cansisyu:36: sadyo jahāti sahajāṃ prakṛtiṃ yadeṣa duḥkhaṃ tataḥ kimaparaṃ bhuvi sajjanasya || Śl_16 ||
T10cansisyu:37: yaḥ prapya nāvamiva dharmamayīṃ viśālāṃ bhūyo jahāti padavīṃ munibhiḥ praklṛptām |
T10cansisyu:40: so 'vaśyameva tarivaśaṃ masaḥ krameṇa sarvāḥ samāśca visamāśca gatīḥ prayāti || Śl_18 ||
T10cansisyu:42: āviśya garbhanilayaṃ nirayaṃ yathaiva duḥkhaṃ mahatsa sahate paripiṇḍatāṅgaḥ || Śl_19 ||
T10cansisyu:43: kālakramena sa tato dṛḍhatailayantraniṣpīḍyamāna iva yāti bhuvaṃ kathaṃcit |
T10cansisyu:44: sadyastathāpi yadayaṃ na jahāti jīvaṃ duḥkhopabhogagatidurlabhi tattadeva
T10cansisyu:49: sa tato'pi patatyacetanaḥ patito naiva jahāti vikriyām |
T10cansisyu:50: ajarāmaramātmavigrahaṃ lalitaṃ manyata evaṃ bāliśaḥ || Śl_23 ||
T10cansisyu:51: sa vihāya munīndrasevitaṃ supathaṃ yātyapathena mohitaḥ |
T10cansisyu:52: rabhasena parāṃ vicūrṇayan gajavajjātamado niraṅkuśaḥ || Śl_24 ||
T10cansisyu:53: atha tasya balādanicchataḥ śirasi nyastapadā sunirdayam |
T10cansisyu:54: niśitaṃ palitāṅkuśaṃ jarā kariṇo hastipakīva yacchati || Śl_25 ||
T10cansisyu:56: sukṛtāni karoti mohitaḥ śaravatsvātmavadhāya puṣpitaḥ || Śl_26 ||
T10cansisyu:58: śirasi grasituṃ pravartate nirupāyapraśamo jarārujaḥ || Śl_27 ||
T10cansisyu:59: vidalanti tato 'sya sanvayo matirutkrāmati hīyate gatiḥ |
T10cansisyu:60: kṣayameti vapuḥ pariślaṣaṃ niyataṃ vardhata eva jīvitāśā || Śl_28 ||
T10cansisyu:62: upagacchati yāmayaṃ daśāṃ narake sā yadi bhīma eva saḥ || Śl_29 ||
T10cansisyu:63: kathamevamidaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ kathamevaṃ na kṛtaṃ hatā gatiḥ |
T10cansisyu:64: kathamevamayaṃ mayāstakaḥ śirasi nyastapado na lakṣitaḥ || Śl_30 ||
T10cansisyu:66: vyadhitena savāṣpavāriṇā karuṇaṃ bandhujanena vīkṣitaḥ || Śl_31 ||
T10cansisyu:68: vijahāti nijaṃ kaḍevaraṃ dayitaṃ yatnapareṇa rakṣitam || Śl_32 ||
T10cansisyu:70: na śṛṇoti jano 'sya bhāṣitaṃ svakṛtākrandaravādivākulaḥ || Śl_33 ||
T10cansisyu:73: dūrānnirīkṣya vimalaṃ salilaṃ pipāsurabhyeti gāḍhatṛṣito yadayaṃ tadeva |
T10cansisyu:81: tāpārditasya dahanaṃ tu hitānilo 'pi śītārditasya dahano 'pi karoti śītam |
T10cansisyu:98: utpāṭayanti nayane sphurataḥ prasahya tatra sthitasya bakavāyasakaṅkagṛdhrāḥ || Śl_47 ||
T10cansisyu:99: teṣāṃ mukhaiḥ kuliśakoṭinibhaiḥ prasahya nidrāyamānavapureṣa kṛtārtanādaḥ
T10cansisyu:110: ā cetaso jaḍataratvamupetakāyāstiṣṭhanti śītanarakeṣu bhṛśaṃ nadantaḥ ||
T10cansisyu:112: sitāsthisakalāṭalīracitabhūṣaṇaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ pravṛttamiva bhairavaṃ sasujacarma hāhāravam || caṭacchaḍhaditi kvacitsphuradurusphuliṅgākulaṃ chamacchamaditi kṣaṇasthagitajṛmbhitaṃ medasi
T10cansisyu:113: kaṭatkaṭaditi kvaṇantamuraso 'sthirandhrāntare patanti narakānalaṃ vijitakalpakālānalam purāṇatṛṇajarjarajvalitaparśukāx xxx xxx xlatālavo dhagiti vāntadīptārciṣaḥ |
T10cansisyu:114: sphuṭajjaṭharaniḥsṛtaprasaradantrasaṃtrāsitāḥ vimuktagurughargharadhvanitamātraśeṣakriyāḥ nirīkṣya vivarāntaraṃ muhurapāvṛtaṃ dūrataḥ prayānti kathamapyamī pramataduḥkhamokṣāśrayāḥ
T10cansisyu:115: yadā tadapi ghaṭṭitaṃ bhavati karmapaṭṭairdṛḍhaistadā viphalavāñchitāḥ kimapi yānti duḥkhāntaram jvalanniśitatomaraprakaravarṣaṇānantaraṃ dravīkṛtamayorasaṃ dahanaraśmimālākulam |
T10cansisyu:119: te jantavo girinadījalalolajīvā auṣṭhyaṃ tadeva narakeṣu ta eva cāgniḥ |
T10cansisyu:120: karmāṇi tatkhalu tathā pariṇāmayanti sarvaṃ yathā paramadāruṇamāvibhāti ||
T10cansisyu:123: mleccheṣu vā narakapālasamavrateṣu tiryakṣu vā kṛtaparasparabhakṣaṇeṣu |
T10cansisyu:124: jātiṃ labheta yadi tatra tadeva śīlamāsevate patati yena punaḥ prapātam ||
T10cansisyu:126: cintāmaṇerapi samabhyadhikaṃ guṇaughairmānuṣyakaṃ ka iha tadviphalīkaroti
T10cansisyu:129: śvaḥ kāryametadidamadya paraṃ muhūrtādetatkṣaṇāditi janena vicintyamāne |
T10cansisyu:130: tiryagnirīkṣaṇapiśaṅgitakāladaṇḍaḥ śaṅke hasatyasahanaḥ kupitaḥ kṛtāntaḥ || Śl_65 ||
T10cansisyu:132: sarvaḥ prahṛṣyati jano na punarmamaitadāyuḥ prahīṇamiti yāti paraṃ viṣādam
T10cansisyu:138: kiṃ sā ratiḥ surasaritsu viviktaramyatīrāsu yā śucijalāsu vane nadīṣu ||
T10cansisyu:139: viśālāḥ śailānāṃ viratajanasaṃpātasubhagā guhā gāḍhābhogā haritavanalekhāparikarāḥ |
T10cansisyu:140: sarittīrāsannā surajamadhurairnirjanaravairna gamyāḥ kleśāgnerayamiti vadantīva pathikān || māyāmarīcidakacandrataraṃgakalpāḥ kāmā jinena gaditā vibhavāḥ striyaśca |
T10cansisyu:141: svapnāntadurlabhitavibhramavipralabdhā bālāḥ patanti nirayeṣvapi yeṣu saktāḥ || Śl_71 ||
T10cansisyu:142: āpātamātramadhurā viṣayā viṣaśca ghorā viṣākakaṭukā viṣayā viṣaśca |
T10cansisyu:143: mohāndhakāragahanā viṣayā viṣaśca durvāravegacapalā viṣayā viṣaśca ||
T10cansisyu:144: kāmā viṣaśca viṣayāśca nirūpyamānāḥ śreyo viṣaṃ na viṣayā viṣamasvabhāvāḥ
T10cansisyu:145: ekatra janmani viṣaṃ viṣatāṃ prayāti janmāntare 'pi viṣayā viṣatāṃ prayānti || Śl_73 ||
T10cansisyu:147: upayuktaṃ viṣaṃ hanti viṣayāḥ smaraṇādapi || Śl_74 ||
T10cansisyu:148: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vrajati viṣaṃ viṣeṇa śāntiṃ sanmantrairagadadharaiśca sādhyamānam |
T10cansisyu:149: yuktaṃ vā bhavati viṣaṃ hitāya nṝṇāṃ na tvevaṃ viṣayamahāviṣaṃ kadācit ||
T10cansisyu:151: śvabhre patatyatha ca nāstu ta eva lābhastadvatsukhānvitamatiḥ khalu jīvalokaḥ || Śl_76 ||
T10cansisyu:156: sparśe sukhāsu padapātanatonnatāsu merornitambapadavīṣu ciraṃ vihṛtya |
T10cansisyu:159: ghoraṃ sthirāśrayamameyamanantapāramandhaṃ tamaḥ punaradhaḥśirasā patanti || Śl_80 ||
T10cansisyu:161: karmānilākulagatiḥ kugatiḥ prayāti ko nāma tatra puruṣo na bhayaṃ bhajeta
T10cansisyu:162: pramlāyamānakusumāḥ śrux xx digdhā mlānāmbarāḥ karuṇadīkṣitabandhuvargāḥ
T10cansisyu:163: duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yadamarā maraṇe vrajanti tanmānavā na jalabudbudalolajīvāḥ || Śl_82 ||
T10cansisyu:165: tanmatyorvadanamapāvṛtaṃ viśālaṃ tadbījaṃ punarapi janmapādapasya || Śl_83
T10cansisyu:167: sattvānāṃ bhavajaladhau pariplutānāṃ matsyanāṃ baḍiśamivāntakena dattam ||
T10cansisyu:169: krodhāpūrṇaiḥ subahubhirayomudgaraistāḍyamānā manyate taṃ paramiva sukhaṃ nārakā yadvadeva tadvadduḥkhairaniśamavaśo dāruṇaiḥ pīḍyamānastāvatkālaṃ jaraṇamaṇarakṣobhamuktaḥ kathaṃcit
T10cansisyu:170: mandībhūte kṣaṇamapi nije duḥsahe duḥkhavahnau sarvo lokastanusukhalavagrāmatṛṣṇāṃ karoti yāvadyāvajjagati sakale jāyate saukhyasaṃjñā tāvattāvadbahutaraśikho jāyate rāgabahniḥ |
T10cansisyu:171: yāvadyāvadvisarati śubhā bhāvanā bhāvyamānā tāvattāvadbahalataratāmeti mohāndhakāram || Śl_87
T10cansisyu:175: tasyānṛtasya phalamugramidaṃ kavīnāṃ tāsveva garbhanilayaṃ padamī viśanti
T10cansisyu:176: kā saugatirjagati yā śataśo na yātā kiṃ tatsukhaṃ yadaśakṛnna purānubhūtam
T10cansisyu:177: kāstāḥ śriyaścapalacāmaracāruhāsāḥ prāptā na yāstadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ || Śl_90 ||
T10cansisyu:178: nadyo na tā na vihṛtaṃ pulineṣu yāsāṃ sthānaṃ na tajjagati yatra kṛto na vāsaḥ |
T10cansisyu:179: vyomnāpi tanna padamasti na yatra yātaṃ duṣpūraṇastadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ || Śl_91 ||
T10cansisyu:180: duḥkhaṃ na tadyadasakṛnna purānubhūtaṃ kāmā na te jagati yairiha tṛptirāsīt |
T10cansisyu:181: sattvo na so 'sti jaṭhare śayitaṃ na yasya saṃsāriṇastadapi nāsti kathaṃ virāgaḥ || Śl_92
T10cansisyu:182: atyāyate jagati janmaparigrahe 'sminduḥkhe sukhe ca bahuśaḥ parivartamānaḥ
T10cansisyu:183: nāsau jano jagati yo na babhūva bandhurdveṣoragastadapi tiṣṭhati bhīmabhogaḥ || Śl_93 ||
T10cansisyu:184: yaiḥ sārdhametya hasitaṃ lalitaṃ pragītamekatra pītamaśitaṃ ca kṛtāśca goṣṭhyaḥ |
T10cansisyu:185: kālakrameṇa gamitāḥ kati ke 'pi ramyā nītāḥ samāśca viṣamāśca daśāḥ kathaṃcit || Śl_94
T10cansisyu:187: saṃsārasāgaragatānapahāya bandhūnekaḥ prayāti yadi nāsti tataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ
T10cansisyu:188: aṅkasthitena śiśunā vivaśena yāsāṃ pītaḥ payodhararasaṃ praṇayānuyātaḥ |
T10cansisyu:192: tā duḥkhitā aśaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇā vihāya ko nāma śatrurapi gantumihotsaheta ||
T10cansisyu:193: vikīrṇe duḥkhaughairjagati vivaśe 'sminnaśaraṇe parārthe yadduḥkhaṃ tadiha
T10cansisyu:195: kṣaṇaṃ kṣuttṛṣṇoṣṇaśramavigamaramyānarucaḥ paraṃ kṛtvā teṣāmapi yadiha ka ivāsya pratisamaḥ na sāramyairyā naiva ca nṛpatilakṣmīparikarairna dārairnāpatyairna surabhavane nāsuragatau
T10cansisyu:196: kathaṃcitsaṃprāpyaṃ x viṣayasukhaṃ bhogaparamairlabhante yā prītiṃ parahitasukhādhānaniratāḥ svayaṃ ghāsagrāsaṃ paśurapi karotyeva sulabhaṃ yadṛcchā labdhaṃ vā pibati salilaṃ gāḍhatṛṣitaḥ
T10cansisyu:197: parasyārtha kartuṃ yadiha puruṣo 'yaṃ prayatate tadasya svaṃ tejaḥ sukhamidamaho pauruṣamidam yadālokaṃ kuvan bhramati raviraśrāntaturagaḥ sadālokaṃ dhatte yadagaṇitabhārā vasumatī |
T10cansisyu:198: na sa svārthaḥ kaścitprakṛtiriyameva mahatāṃ yadete lokānāṃ hitasukharasaikāntarasikāḥ || avidyādhūmrāndhabhramaparigatavyākulagatipradīpte duḥkhāgnau patitamavaśaṃ vīkṣya bhuvanam
T10cansisyu:199: sphuradvahnijvālā pramathitaśiroveṣṭananibhā yātante ye 'trādbhuta iha puruṣāste sukṛtinaḥ avīciṃ gāhante hutavahaśikhāpūritamapi prasarpadromāñcā himanikaracandrāṃśuśiśiram |
T10cansisyu:200: parārthex xx sphuṭanalinahāsāpi nalinī karotyeṣāṃ tāpaṃ hutavahaśikhāsaṃhatiriva || Śl_103
T10cansisyu:202: na punaramarasundarīsahāyāḥ kṣaṇamapi nandanakānane ramante || Śl_104 ||
T10cansisyu:203: aśaraṇajanatāraṇāya tīrṇāḥ punarapi vaitaraṇīṃ taranti dhīrāḥ |
T10cansisyu:205: iti sucaritaratnaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ śivamamṛtamudāraṃ bhāsuraṃ bhāsurāṇām |
T10cansisyu:206: asulabhamakṛtajñairnandanaṃ nandanānāṃ bhaja samasukhahetuṃ maṅgalaṃ maṅgalānām || Śl_106
T10cansisyu:207: sugatavacanapuṣpaṃ sarvadā sevanīyaṃ phalati phalamudāraṃ puṣpameva drumāṇām |
T10cansisyu:208: sugatavacanapuṣpādartharāśirniṣevyo madhuni mudhakarāṇāṃ yasya vāñchāprakarṣam || Śl_107 ||
T10cansisyu:209: visṛja viṣayānnītyākīrṇāṃ kṣaṇavyayasaṅgino bhaja samasukhaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ kṛtāntabhayojjhitam
T10cansisyu:210: vikara timiraṃ mohavyājaṃ vimokṣayathārgalaṃ na khalu suciraṃ nidrāyante sadaśvakiśorakāḥ vinayavisaro vīryaskandhaḥ kṣamādamapallavaḥ śamathakusumaḥ prajñāśākhaḥ pradānaghanacchadaḥ
T10cansisyu:211: praṇidhiśikharaḥ śīlacchāyaḥ praśāntiphalaprado bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahādrumaḥ bahujanahito mābhairvādapradānamahāsvanaḥ pṛthutaraśodhārāsāraḥ kṛpānilacoditaḥ |
T10cansisyu:212: praśamitarajaḥ śīlacchāyāvibhūṣitabhūtalo bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahāghanaḥ || prakaṭavipulaṃ paṅkāgādhaḥ prasannatarāśrayaḥ satataśiśiro jālavyālapramādavivarjitaḥ |
T10cansisyu:213: prakṛtisubhagastṛṣṇācchedāvimardabharakṣamo bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahāhradaḥ iti nigadatā yadupārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ mayā kiyatsugatacarite kṛtvā śraddhāmanena jano 'khilaḥ |
T10cansisyu:214: satatasukhito ramyābhogaḥ samṛddhamanorathaḥ parahitarataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ prayātu tataḥ śanaiḥ karatalasamāḥ spaṣṭālokāḥ praśāntakṛśānavaḥ sthalakamalinīpattracchannā bisāṅkuradanturāḥ
T10cansisyu:215: śucisurabhayaḥ sphullāmbhojairvibhūṣitabhūmayo dadhatu narakāḥ sphītāṃ śobhāṃ saśīkaravāyavaḥ vijitaṃvirutamārānīkāḥ kṛtābhayaghoṣaṇā gaganasalilakrīḍā ramyā sameta narāmarāḥ |
T10cansisyu:216: jananamaraṇakleśāyāsaprabandhavighātino diśi diśi sadā buddhotpādā bhavantu samīhitāḥ || Śl_114
T10cansisyu:217: bhavatu jagatāṃ dharmāmodaḥ prabandhamahotsavaḥ suciraguṇitā mṛtyorbandhyā bhavantu manorathāḥ
T10cansisyu:218: munijanakathāgoṣṭhībandhaiḥ samāvṛtavarṣibhiḥ satataśiśiraḥ subhagacandrālokaḥ prayātu kṛtārthatām || iti śiṣyalekhanāma dharmakāvyaṃ samāptam ||
